name: Trio Master
description:
Have you ever played a calm and relaxing puzzle game where it’s all only about your skill and having fun? Please meet Trio Master - an awesome combination of challenge and calming match-3 experience!
Match items in groups of 3 through a variety of levels, get rewards and rock the leaderboards to become the top Trio Master in your home country or across the world.
Trio Master has everything to add fun to your life:
Plenty of cool 3D items to match.
Simple but addicting gameplay.
Teams to have fun together with other players and make new friends.
Special events and tournaments to compete and become the best in your country and across the world.
You can play for challenge, you can play for fun, you can play to take a couple minutes to relax and beat a couple of levels - Trio Master is about all of this.
Play on your own or invite your friends to the game to have more fun together.
There’s so many levels to pass, items to match and challenges to compete. Don’t miss out all the fun, get into a new level of match 3 puzzle fun and become a true Trio Master now!
